snippet: President Obama said Thursday he was “comfortable” with a Food and Drug Administration decision to allow over-the-counter access to morning-after pills for girls as young as 15.
abstract: Pres Obama says he is 'comfortable' with Food and Drug Administration decision to allow over-the-counter access to morning-after pills for girls as young as 15 years old.
lead_paragraph: President Obama said Thursday he was “comfortable” with a Food and Drug Administration decision to allow over-the-counter access to morning-after pills for girls as young as 15.

headline.seo: Obama Backs New F.D.A. Limits on Morning-After Pill
headline.main: Obama Backs Birth Control Rule Change
headline.print_headline: Obama Backs Birth Control Rule Change
